Class PropertyServiceFacadeCacheProxy

java.lang.Object
  com.cboe.domain.property.PropertyServiceFacadeCacheProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.cboe.interfaces.domain.property.PropertyServiceFacade
public class PropertyServiceFacadeCacheProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.cboe.interfaces.domain.property.PropertyServiceFacade

Provides caching as a proxy to another implementation of the PropertyServiceFacade.

findKeyLockObject

protected java.lang.String findKeyLockObject(java.lang.String category,
                                             java.lang.String key,
                                             boolean addIfNotFound)
Tries to find the existing cache String lock object for matching category and key

Parameters:
category - to find lock object for
key - to find lock object for
addIfNotFound - If true and lock object was not found, one will be created and returned. If false and one is not found, null will be returned.
Returns:
found lock object, new lock object, or null depending on the value of addIfNotFound parameter
